COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x120
STRING: [Phorni] “I guess it's time to say goodbye to this city.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x136
STRING: [Chris] “Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15a
STRING: Phorni looked out the window with longing in her eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x166
STRING: The rain fell against the window, making it hard to see
anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x172
STRING: That didn't seem to bother Phorni at all, who just kept
staring at the scenery outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d4
STRING: In the end, I somehow managed to graduate from the
Piova Communal School of Music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ea
STRING: I had even prepared a withdrawal letter, but Ms. Cordell
had sent me a short note informing me of the result.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x202
STRING: “Congratulations, you graduated. Come to school at
once.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x210
STRING: She explained everything to me when I met her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21c
STRING: My performance didn't fulfill the criteria, of course.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x228
STRING: When I asked why I was still allowed to graduate, she
smiled.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x242
STRING: “We heard the voice of an angel, however ridiculous
that seems.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24e
STRING: Many of the guests who'd been called to judge clearly
wrote in their forms that I'd failed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x264
STRING: But some musicians and teachers, including Ms. Cordell,
had raised objections.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27a
STRING: Some of the musicians claimed they had heard an
angel's voice singing, but even if that weren't true, they
insisted the performance itself was excellent and should
be evaluated.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29a
STRING: The others had no choice but to accept that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b0
STRING: And that was the reason I received not only a
graduation certificate, but offers from several orchestras
as well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c6
STRING: I felt terrible rejecting all of them, but the future was no
longer mine alone to decide.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ec
STRING: In the end, I wasn't able to graduate from the Piova
Communal School of Music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x302
STRING: I'd expected it all along, so I wasn't that affected.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x318
STRING: Performing with her had meant something to me, and I
cared nothing for the opinions of others.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32e
STRING: Right after the graduation recital, I'd received a thin
envelope.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33a
STRING: It contained a letter which stated, tersely and sterilely,
that I'd failed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x350
STRING: That same day, I brought the withdrawal letter I'd
prepared to school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x366
STRING: There I met with Ms. Cordell, who said just one thing to
me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37c
STRING: “If you ever feel like returning to music, come back here.
You'll always be welcome.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x394
STRING: I probably wouldn't have to hold her to those words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a0
STRING: But I was extremely happy to hear her say them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b6
STRING: I thanked her profusely and apologized for what
happened, but she just laughed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d0
STRING: We were going back to the town where we were born.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3dc
STRING: And we would probably never return to Piova.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ee
STRING: Even if she never woke up, I'd stay by her side always.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x44c
STRING: [Phorni] “Something on your mind?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x462
STRING: [Chris] “You could say that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x480
STRING: [Phorni] “Thinking about what's to come?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x496
STRING: [Chris] “Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ac
STRING: I gave brief answers so that I'd have more time to think.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d4
STRING: [Phorni] “...What are you going to do?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ea
STRING: [Chris] “For a start, I'll go see her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x508
STRING: [Phorni] “And then?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51e
STRING: [Chris] “I'll make a decision, about everything.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x550
STRING: [Phorni] “...I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x566
STRING: Phorni looked out the window once again, her wings
fluttering.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ae
STRING: [Phorni] “Gah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c4
STRING: Everything got dark all of a sudden, which surprised
Phorni and made her fall backward.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5da
STRING: I'd kept my eye on Phorni, so I was able to support her
back with my finger.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f0
STRING: [Chris] “See, that's dangerous.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x622
STRING: [Phorni] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x64c
STRING: Phorni grabbed my finger with her tiny hands, almost
caressing it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x662
STRING: Then she turned around and leaned her back against it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x686
STRING: And then, with a soft plop, Phorni tumbled into the
middle of my palm.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x69c
STRING: [Chris] “...Hey, I can't move my hand.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ba
STRING: [Phorni] “So what? It feels comfortable.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d0
STRING: [Chris] “Are you sleepy?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ee
STRING: [Phorni] “Yes, just a little.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x704
STRING: [Chris] “Do you want to sleep?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x722
STRING: [Phorni] “Yes. Wake me up when we get there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x738
STRING: [Chris] “Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x74e
STRING: It seemed even Phorni could get sleepy sometimes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x75a
STRING: Just like a small bird, Phorni folded her wings and slept
in the hollow of my palm.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x770
STRING: The warmth of her body was making me feel sleepy
too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x77c
STRING: [Chris] “...Good night. I'll take a nap too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x792
STRING: I carefully placed the sleeping Phorni on my lap so that
she wouldn't fall, and then I fell asleep.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a8
STRING: I planned to sleep until our arrival was announced.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e8
STRING: My eyes were closed, but I realized that I was still
conscious.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7f4
STRING: The underside of my eyelids was a pale shade of red.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x800
STRING: Taking heart in the weight I held in my palm, I slowly
opened my eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x82c
STRING: There was only the blue expanse of the sky outside the
window.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x838
STRING: [Chris] “Clear skies...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x84e
STRING: How many years had it been, I wondered.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x85a
STRING: That familiar scene was a powerful image that led my
mind directly to Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x870
STRING: Arietta's face, under this blue, cloudless sky.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x87c
STRING: And her voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8a0
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni? Look, the sun is out.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8b6
STRING: [Phorni] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8cc
STRING: [Chris] “The rain's stopped.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ec
STRING: ...The rain had stopped, for good.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f8
STRING: [Chris] “I see, you want to sleep some more? No
problem.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x90e
STRING: I was speaking to myself as I looked out the window.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x932
STRING: The sky was a brilliant shade of blue.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d6
STRING: The train reached our hometown in the dead of night.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e2
STRING: I really didn't feel like going to my home, so I waited
there for the morning to come.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f8
STRING: Phorni had remained asleep since that time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa06
STRING: I held her with both hands, protecting her body from
the cold.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa1c
STRING: When the station was finally bathed in the morning
light, I stood up and headed for the hospital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa32
STRING: Arietta had to be there, I was sure of it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa4c
STRING: “...Phorni? We'll be there soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa58
STRING: Right now, Phorni was probably in a state very much
like Arietta's.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa6e
STRING: I couldn't think of any good reason why, or of any
absurd ones, for that matter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa7a
STRING: Even so, I believed that was the truth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xacc
STRING: And there, I found her in that state.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad8
STRING: Arietta's eyes were closed, as if in slumber, and she
didn't move at all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaee
STRING: Hesitantly, I moved closer to her, and touched her
cheek with my free hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb04
STRING: She felt warm, and in that moment I was so relieved I
wanted to cry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb1a
STRING: And then, even though she wouldn't open her eyes, I
spoke to her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb30
STRING: [Chris] “Arietta... I'm back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb46
STRING: [Chris] “After three years, just like I promised.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb74
STRING: I lay Phorni, my constant companion, down by Arie's
pillow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb8a
STRING: Phorni was Arie, and Arie herself was Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb96
STRING: For three long years, she had remained asleep,
unconscious.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbac
STRING: The doctor who'd allowed me to visit had told me, very
honestly, that she may never regain consciousness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc2
STRING: Only family was allowed to visit, but he had
remembered my face from the one time I visited in the
past three years, and treated me as if I were her family.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbe2
STRING: Even if she never woke up, I didn't mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbee
STRING: I would spend the rest of my life in the tiny room with
her, I really didn't mind at all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc04
STRING: I never expected any miracles.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc1a
STRING: I'd simply come back to where I should be, to the
person I should be with.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc26
STRING: That was all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc32
STRING: Or that's what I thought...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc68
STRING: [Chris] “...Arie? Phorni?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc7e
STRING: It all happened in just one instant.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc8a
STRING: Her body didn't glow or anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc96
STRING: There weren't any loud chords played on a pipe organ.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca2
STRING: Phorni's tiny body just got absorbed into Arie's.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb8
STRING: That was all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc4
STRING: And after that, there wasn't a single trace of Phorni's
existence, and all I could see was Arietta's frail, sleeping
body.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce4
STRING: [Chris] “...Arietta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcfa
STRING: I knew it was pointless, but I called her name once
more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd06
STRING: And the response was beyond my wildest expectations.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd3a
STRING: Her eyes opened, and stopped somewhere in midair.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd50
STRING: [Chris] “Arie?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd6e
STRING: [Arie] “...Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd84
STRING: In that moment, I almost burst into tears like a child.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd90
STRING: I couldn't even shout for joy and run to her side, I just
silently prayed that I wasn't imagining things, and
moved closer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdae
STRING: [Arie] “I'm sorry, Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc4
STRING: [Chris] “...No, I should be the one to apologize. I'm
really sorry... Arietta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdfa
STRING: [Arie] “But I was always leading you off in different
directions...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe1a
STRING: [Chris] “I don't care about all that now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe30
STRING: Arie gave a pained look, then she started coughing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe3c
STRING: Her body hadn't moved in three years.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe48
STRING: It was only natural.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe54
STRING: [Chris] “Hey, take things easy. When you get better,
we'll talk. I'll be by your side, always.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe8a
STRING: [Chris] “Always... I will never leave you again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xea8
STRING: [Arie] “...Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed6
STRING: Arietta sobbed quietly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee2
STRING: She probably didn't even have the strength to let it all
out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeee
STRING: I took her hand in mine and kept patting it to calm her,
so she wouldn't strain herself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf04
STRING: I wanted to prove that I was there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf10
STRING: I wanted the warmth of my hand to touch her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf2a
STRING: At last, Arie seemed to tire of crying and closed her
eyes, then she opened them again after her breathing
settled.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf60
STRING: [Arie] “...Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf76
STRING: [Chris] “What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf94
STRING: [Arie] “I always read your letters, you know. As I sat by
your side, listening to you play the Fortelle.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfbe
STRING: [Chris] “Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfd4
STRING: With a knowing smile that softened her pained
expression, Arie added one last thing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1008
STRING: [Arie] “...Welcome back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x101e
STRING: [Chris] “Yes... It's good to be home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ae
STRING: How many years had it been since that time, I
wondered.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ba
STRING: It took a whole six months for her atrophied muscles to
regain their strength.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c6
STRING: But even that time was spent together, and we were
truly happy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10da
STRING: [Arie] “...Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10f0
STRING: After she got better, we worked hard to save enough
money for a small house of our own.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1106
STRING: We renovated it, turned it into a music school, and
starting taking in students much like we had been so
many years ago.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x111c
STRING: Was that only a year ago?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x113e
STRING: I didn't know if I should be thankful, but there was a
baseless rumor that I'd performed excellently at the
Piova Communal School of Music, so we had an endless
supply of interested students.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1164
STRING: I didn't know if I should be thankful, but just because I
was able to play the Fortelle, we had an endless supply
of interested students.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1184
STRING: I took lessons seriously and treated each student with
sincerity, which led to our music school becoming
well-known throughout town.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11a4
STRING: By leading simple, humble lives, the two of us managed
to find happiness, and that was enough.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c2
STRING: [Arie] “Chris, you sneaky...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d8
STRING: [Chris] “...Yes, yes, I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ee
STRING: Arie seemed to have picked up a little bit of an attitude
from her time as Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1204
STRING: I loved everything about her, of course.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1210
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, one more time from rehearsal letter A.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1256
STRING: [Arie] “Oh...okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1294
STRING: [Arie] “I have just one wish, to be your inspiration...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12cc
STRING: [Chris] “...Alright, stop right there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12f8
STRING: [Arie] “Ugh... Urrrgh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x130e
STRING: [Chris] “The song was written just for you. How could
you be so off?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1336
STRING: [Arie] “...Because you're a meanie?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x134c
STRING: [Chris] “Uh-huh. Okay, from the top.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x136a
STRING: [Arie] “I mean, I want to sing it well...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1380
STRING: [Chris] “That's why we're practicing, right? Come on, I'll
accompany you, no matter how long it takes for you to
master it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13a8
STRING: [Arie] “Grr...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13be
STRING: [Chris] “I'll be with you, always.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ea
STRING: [Arie] “Hehe...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1400
STRING: [Chris] “Alright, one more time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1428
STRING: This music school's first student was none other than-

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x143c
STRING: The musically-challenged love of my life.
